name: EggXplode
description:
Synopsis

After you wandered in the meadows. You stole the sacred chick egg. To punish you, the curse falls on you. You will have no choice but survive in this new hostile environment. But be carreful! Your own eggs have become explosive... oh and well, the chicks are pretty pissed now. But you are about to notice.

How to survive?

First by moving: Arrows or AWSD to move and... Pad (not tested but should be ok :))

Then by staying alive 90 seconds.

Produced for

MiniJam 99 - Birds, Can't stop moving
